Author: advisor_moon
Title: [ANN][ICO]B21 - Personal Wealth Manager for Cryptoassets
Body: I see the impact you are trying to make in the crypto industry, bringing cryptocurrency investment to the general population. I also had a look over your app B21Life and I believe it has great content, hands down the best app for a Cryptocurrency Newbie !  My question - If I start investing with B21Invest, am I investing on a centralised platform or a decentralised ? I do not believe in keeping my crypto-assets on an exchange, I prefer my hardware wallet. How is B21 going to secure my funds?

Author: B21Official
Title: [ANN][ICO]B21 - Personal Wealth Manager for Cryptoassets
Body: Thanks for believing in the B21 project and B21Life. Coming to your question, we provide regulated custody solution.  So your crypto is kept with us in a regulated manner.  It is much more secure and insured

Author: B21Official
Title: [ANN][ICO]B21 - Personal Wealth Manager for Cryptoassets
Body: We offer a centralized service with custody license from Gibraltar.  Mass market / common people would not be comfortable managing their private keys etc.  Hence regulated custody service is what we offer. Does that answer your question. Happy to discuss further.

Author: B21Official
Title: [ANN][ICO]B21 - Personal Wealth Manager for Cryptoassets
Body: The inspiration for B21 came from the fact that there will only ever be 21 million Bitcoins made and the B represents bitcoin, block, blockchain and a ‚ÄòBillion positively impacted people‚Äô, which is one of our main objectives‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääto build the world‚Äôs largest cryptoasset investment community.  Coming to your question on risk, Risk is for the underlying asset/instrument.

Author: B21Official
Title: [ANN][ICO]B21 - Personal Wealth Manager for Cryptoassets
Body: As part of our main objective to build the world‚Äôs largest community of cryptoasset investors, we recognise that there is a large education and information gap in the market. Inexperienced investors need educational information to get comfortable with cryptocurrencies, and have put off investing due to its complicated process and the lack of quality information. That is why we created B21Life to help educated potential cryptoasset investors like you, who are eager to get started but are not sure how or where to begin.  Check out B21Life App.
